about_the_game:
Paradox Vector is a retro FPS with vector graphics and non-euclidean geometry, but did you know that every piece of music in Paradox Vector was procedurally generated by my other games Anomalies and Star Explorers? These songs are not generated in-game like the ones in Star Explorers and Anomalies, but were recorded and edited so they could be used in Paradox Vector.

The songs were chosen in a way I felt matched the environment. There are some weird ones in the early levels, some slow and creepy ones in the caves and some more mechanical sounding songs in the factory area.
